text: Roger Mynors Swinfen Eady, 3rd Baron Swinfen, (14 December 1938 â€“ 5 June 2022) was a British politician and philanthropist. He was one of the ninety two hereditary peers elected to the House of Lords in 1977. He sat as a Conservative. He was appointed Member of the Order of the British Empire (MBE) in 2016. Swinfen died on 5 June 2022, at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:British philanthropists Category:Conservative members of the House of Lords Category:United Kingdom Barons
title: Roger Swinfen Eady, 3rd Baron Swinfen
